## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand while accounting for potential variations and lead time. This order quantity also benefits from the discount threshold and allows for multiple vendor order quantities (2 x 10,000). |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 2,965 units lower than the player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.4 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6.5 days                                |
| Comments                          | This recommendation balances the need to maintain enough stock to meet demand with avoiding excessive inventory. The order size allows for a higher safety stock and better inventory turnover rate while staying within the discount threshold. |
